ygData.subject: RE: Ykesha? Just say Yes-sha
ygData.msgSnippet: Great, just what Norrath needs, another warrior only weapon.  Don t they all already have Boxes of Abu Kar full of them?  Langseax of the Wolves has now
ygData.messageBody:
Great, just what Norrath needs, another warrior only weapon. Don't they all
already have Boxes of Abu Kar full of them? Langseax of the Wolves has now
dropped to 30pp on E'ci, ridiculous. Sixth level warriors can now afford it
without twinking! Oh well, maybe some day I'll see a bard only magic item
before I die, but I doubt it. At this rate I won't be 46th for 2 more
years.

Kitasi
Sick of warriors' stuff already on E'ci


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

what i heard was that soon the ghoul lord will drop a sword that is warrior
only with similar stats. just a rumour as of now, i haven't heard this
happening on any live servers yet.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L30 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server
